title: Looking for Plat+ Ranked 5s Top laner
body:
Hey Summoners,

Looking for an experienced top laner to participate in plat/diamond ranked 5s.

Requirements:

 - Decently sized and meta orientated champion pool is preferred
 - You must be willing to engage in post-game analysis
 - It's essential that you actively communicate in-game
 - Able to give and receive constructive criticism

Team: Team Dink n Eric
IGN: Fraggin

Add me in game or comment below if you're interested!


Thanks!
